title: Reactor Entity Schema
description: Reactor entity definition - extracted from game-state.json for context window optimization. See schemas/formats.json for format specifications.

id.description: Unique reactor identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '3-1' for reactor type 3, index 1). Type 3 = Reactor.

ownerId.description: Player who owns this reactor. Format: 'type-index' (e.g., '1-11' for player type 1, index 11). Type 1 = Player.

structs:verification.note: API response schema. Missing fields from database (validator, guildId, defaultCommission) - these may be in gridAttributes or separate queries. For code-based field definitions, see schemas/entities.json#/definitions/Reactor
structs:verification.databaseReference: structs.reactor table (columns: id, validator, guild_id, default_commission)
